    • Method Detail

      • consumeItem

        public void consumeItem(GameManager manager)
        Ghosts go into soda mode for a duration. This item overrides the super fruit mode, so when soda finishes, ghosts go back to normal mode.
        Overrides:
        consumeItem in class PathBlock
        Parameters:
        manager - GameManager instance.
